about_the_game:
Mars Wars is a top-down shooter game, where you have to defend your base from aliens on Mars.
Here is the discord: [url/][/url]
(This game will change as this is an early look at the game)
You control a rover with different weapons that you can use to kill the aliens.

You get different weapons you start with a normal gun, grenades and a flame thrower (There are more planned).
There will be different maps although at the moment there is only one more is planned.

There are Steam leader boards built in so you will be able to climb the leader board and try to get the best at the game. And compete against your friends.
